resources.string: Enter a title for this subject

string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: The official currency of Kuwait is the Kuwaiti riyal?
Toubkal is the highest peak in the Arab world?
Algeria is the largest Arab country in terms of space?
Casablanca is the capital of Morocco?

string-array.name: answers_details
string-array.item: The official currency of Kuwait is the Kuwaiti Dinar
Topkale is the highest mountain peak in the Arab world and located in Morocco
Algeria is the largest Arab and African country in terms of area
Rabat is the capital of Morocco
